name: telepathy

effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.

short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
